parts.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>Subject: Regarding Your Recent Inquiry / Claim Investigation Results

Dear [Customer Name],

This memo is to follow up on your recent inquiry regarding [briefly state the subject of the inquiry, e.g., your account balance, a specific transaction, our services, etc.] / to inform you of the results of the claim investigation you initiated on [Date of Claim].

[Choose ONE of the following options and tailor it to the specific situation. Be clear and concise. If none of these fit, create a new option that addresses the situation directly.]

**Option 1: Inquiry Response**

We have reviewed your inquiry and [provide a clear and direct answer to the inquiry. Include specific details and relevant information. If further action is needed from the customer, clearly state what is required and the deadline].

**Option 2: Claim Approved**

We have completed our investigation and are pleased to inform you that your claim has been approved. [Explain the resolution, e.g., "A credit of [Amount] will be applied to your account within [Number] business days." or "A replacement [Item] will be shipped to you within [Number] business days."].

**Option 3: Claim Denied**

We have completed our investigation and, unfortunately, we are unable to approve your claim at this time. [Clearly and concisely explain the reason for the denial. Refer to specific policy terms or investigation findings if possible. Offer a potential next step, such as an appeal process, if applicable].

**Option 4: Claim Still Under Investigation**

Our investigation into your claim is still ongoing. We anticipate having a final resolution by [Date]. We will update you as soon as we have more information. We appreciate your patience.

**Option 5: Planned Adjustment**

This is to inform you of a planned adjustment to [Specify what is being adjusted, e.g., your account, your service, etc.]. The adjustment will take effect on [Date] and is due to [Explain the reason for the adjustment clearly and concisely].

[Regardless of the option chosen, include the following closing statements:]

We value your business. If you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us at [Phone Number] or reply to this email.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]

Customer Service Representative

[Company Name]
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
